label: catch
cap: Pollock catch from the Eastern Bering Sea by area, and season (through October 25th 2022). The A season starts January 20th and B season starts on June 10th. The Southeast area refers to the EBS region east of 170W; the Northwest is west of 170W.

label: abc_tac
cap: Time series of 1964--1976 catch (left) and ABC, TAC, and catch for EBS pollock, 1977--2021 in t. Source: compiled from NMFS Regional office web site and various NPFMC reports. Note that the 2022 value is based on catch reported to October 25th 2022 plus an added component due to bycatch of pollock in other fisheries.

label: catch_sca
cap: Total EBS shelf pollock catch recorded by observers (rounded to nearest 100 t) by year and season with percentages indicating the proportion of the catch that came from within the Steller sea lion conservation area (SCA), 1998--2022.

label: mgt
cap: Highlights of some management measures affecting the pollock fishery.

label: catch_disc
cap: Estimates of discarded and retained pollock (t) for the Northwest and Southeastern Bering Sea, 1991--2022. SE represents the EBS east of 170W, NW is the EBS west of 170W, source: NMFS Blend and catch-accounting system database. 2022 data are preliminary.

label: econ_exvess
cap: Pollock in the Bering Sea and Aleutian Islands catch and ex-vessel data. Total and retained catch (thousands of t), number of vessel, catcher vessel total and retained catch (thousand of t), ex-vessel value (million US\$), price (US\$ per pound), catcher vessel share of retained catch and number of catcher vessels; 2005--2007 average, 2010--2010 average, and 2011--2022.

label: econ_first
cap: Alaska pollock in the Bering Sea and Aleutian Islands first wholesale-market data. First-wholesale production (thousands of t), value (million US\$), price (US\$ per pound), and head and gut, fillet, surimi, and roe production volume (thousands of t) value share and price (US\$ per pound); 2005--2007 average, 2008--2010 average, and 2011--2018.

label: econ_trade
cap: Alaska pollock U.S. trade and global market data. Global production (thousands of t), U.S. share of global production, Russian share of global production, U.S. export volume (thousands of t), U.S. export value (million US\$), U.S. export price (US\$ per pound), the share of U.S. export volume and value with Japan, China and Germany, the share of U.S. export volume and value of meats (including H and G and fillets), surimi and roe; 2005--2007 average, 2008--2010 average, and 2011--2018.

label: econ_oil
cap: BSAI pollock fish oil production index (Alaska pollock U.S. trade and global market data).

label: fsh_age
cap: Eastern Bering Sea pollock catch at age estimates based on observer data, 1979--2021. Units are in millions of fish.

label: fsh_meas
cap: Numbers of pollock NMFS observer samples measured for fishery catch length frequency (by sex and strata), 1977--2021.

label: fsh_n
cap: Numbers of pollock fishery samples used for age determination estimates by sex and strata, 1977--2021, as sampled by the NMFS observer program.

label: res_catch
cap: NMFS total pollock research catch by year in t, 1964--2021.

label: bts_abund
cap: Biomass (age 1+) of Eastern Bering Sea pollock as estimated by surveys 1979--2022 (thousands of t). Note that the bottom-trawl survey data only represent biomass from the survey strata (1--6) areas in 1982--1984, and 1986. For all other years the estimates include strata 8--9. DDC indicates the values obtained from the Kotwicki et al. Density-dependence correction method and the VAST column is for the standard survey area including the Northern Bering Sea extension and uses the cold pool as a covariate. BTS=Bottom trawl survey, DB=Design-based, ATS=acoustic trawl survey. The ATS estimate from 2020  arises from data collected aboard uncrewed sailing vessels with acoustic backscatter scaled to be consistent with previous years. BTS estimates include northern Bering Sea extensions.

label: bts_biom
cap: Survey biomass estimates (age 1+, t) of Eastern Bering Sea pollock based on  design-based area-swept expansion methods from NMFS bottom trawl surveys 1982--2022 .

label: bts_n
cap: Sampling effort for pollock in the EBS from the NMFS bottom trawl survey 1982--2022.

label: bts_age
cap: Bottom-trawl survey estimated numbers (in tens of millions) at age used for the stock assessment model. Note that in 1982--84 and 1986 only strata 1--6 were surveyed. Note these estimates are based on design-based procedures.

label: wt_bts
cap: Mean EBS pollock body mass (kg) at age as estimated for the summer NMFS bottom trawl survey, 1982--2022.

label: ats_n
cap: Number of (age 1+) hauls and sample sizes for EBS pollock collected by the AT surveys. Sub-headings E and W represent collections east and west of 170W (within the US EEZ) and US represents the US sub-total and RU represents the collections from the Russian side of the surveyed region.

label: ats_biom
cap: Mid-water pollock biomass (millions of t; near surface down to 0.5m from the bottom) by area as estimated from summer acoustic-trawl surveys on the U.S. EEZ portion of the Bering Sea shelf, 1994--2022 (Honkalehto et al. 2015, McCarthy et al. 2020, and  De Robertis et al. 2021).  Note that in 2020 the survey was carried out by uncrewed sailing vessels.

label: ats_age
cap: AT survey estimates of EBS pollock abundance-at-age (millions), 1979--2022. Age-1s were modeled as a separate index, ages 2+ modeled as proportions at age.

label: avo
cap: An abundance index derived from acoustic data collected opportunistically aboard bottom-trawl survey vessels (AVO index; Stienessen et al. 2022). Note values in parentheses are the coefficients of variation from using 1-D geostatistical estimates of sampling variability (Petitgas, 1993). See Honkalehto et al. (2011) for the derivation of these estimates. The column ``$CV_{AVO}$'' was assumed to have a mean value of 0.30 for model fitting purposes (scaling relative to the AT and BTS indices).

label: input_n
cap: Pollock sample sizes assumed for the age-composition data likelihoods from the fishery, bottom-trawl survey, and AT surveys, 1964--2022. Note fishery sample size for 1964--1977 was fixed at 10.

label: wtage
cap: Mean weight-at-age (kg) estimates from the fishery (1991--2021; plus projections 2022--2024) showing the between-year variability (bottom row).

label: rmse
cap: Goodness of fit (root-mean square log errors) for EBS pollock comparing models. Numbers in bold indicate that that index was used in tuning (otherwise is just for comparing).

label: params1
cap: Parameter estimates and their standard errors.

label: res_summ
cap: Summary of different model results and the stock condition for EBS pollock. Biomass units are thousands of t.

label: tier1_proj
cap: Summary results of Tier 1 2022 yield projections for EBS pollock.

label: est_n
cap: Estimates millions of EBS pollock at age from the 2022 base-case model.

label: est_catage
cap: Assessment model-estimated catch-at-age of EBS pollock (millions; 1964--2022.

label: biom_ssb_rec
cap: Estimated EBS pollock age 3+ biomass, female spawning biomass, and age 1 recruitment for 1964--2022. Biomass units are thousands of t, age-1 recruitment is in millions of pollock.

label: biom_3plus
cap: Estimates of begin-year age 3 and older biomass (thousands of tons) and coefficients of variation (CV) for the current assessment compared to 2015--2021 assessments for EBS pollock.

label: tier3
cap: Tier 3 projections of catch, fishing mortality, and spawning biomass (thousands of t).

label: tier1
cap: Maximum permissible Tier 1a EBS pollock ABC and OFL projections for 2023 and 2024.

label: eco_cons
cap: Analysis of ecosystem considerations for BSAI pollock and the pollock fishery.

label: nontargbycatch
cap: Bycatch estimates (t) of non-target species caught in the BSAI directed pollock fishery, 2003--2022 based on observer data as processed through the catch accounting system (NMFS Regional Office, Juneau, Alaska).

label: fmpbycatch
cap: Bycatch estimates (t) of other target species caught in the BSAI directed pollock fishery, 1997--2022 based on then NMFS Alaska Regional Office reports from observers (2022 data are preliminary).

label: pollbycatch
cap: Bycatch estimates (t) of pollock caught in the other non-pollock EBS directed fisheries, 1997--2022 based on then NMFS Alaska Regional Office reports from observers.

label: pscbycatch
cap: Bycatch estimates of prohibited species caught in the BSAI directed pollock fishery, 1997--2022 based on the AKFIN (NMFS Regional Office) reports from observers. Herring and halibut units are in t, all others represent numbers of individuals caught. Data for 2022 are preliminary. Note that these data include non-pelagic trawl pollock sets and Pacific halibut discard mortality rates are less than 100%.

label: tier3_C
cap: Tier 3 projections of EBS pollock catch for the 7 scenarios.

label: tier3_ABC
cap: Tier 3 projections of EBS pollock ABC for the 7 scenarios. Note: scenario 2 results for 2023 and 2024 are conditioned on catches in that scenario listed in Table \ref{tab:tier3_C}).

label: tier3_F
cap: Tier 3 projections of EBS pollock fishing mortality for the 7 scenarios.

label: tier3_SSB
cap: Tier 3 projections of EBS pollock spawning biomass (kt) for the 7 scenarios.

label: dec_tab_rationale
cap: Details and explanation of the decision table factors selected in response to the Plan Team requests (as originally proposed in the 2012 assessment).

label: ecosys_tab
cap: Ecosystem considerations for BSAI pollock and the pollock fishery.
